listOfURL.Title: UNICEF
listOfURL.Description: UNICEF works in over 190 countries to protect the rights of children and provide humanitarian aid.

listOfURL.Title: Red Cross
listOfURL.Description: The Red Cross provides disaster relief, blood donation services, and emergency assistance worldwide.

listOfURL.Title: World Health Organization (WHO)
listOfURL.Description: The World Health Organization (WHO) leads global health responses and provides public health guidance.

listOfURL.Title: Greenpeace
listOfURL.Description: Greenpeace campaigns for environmental protection and raises funds for sustainability projects.

listOfURL.Title: Facebook
listOfURL.Description: Facebook is a global social networking site that allows users to connect, share, and communicate.

listOfURL.Title: Twitter
listOfURL.Description: Twitter is a microblogging platform where users share short messages and engage in discussions.

listOfURL.Title: LinkedIn
listOfURL.Description: LinkedIn is a professional networking site that connects job seekers with employers.

listOfURL.Title: Instagram
listOfURL.Description: Instagram is a photo and video-sharing platform widely used for social interaction and branding.

listOfURL.Title: Coinbase
listOfURL.Description: Coinbase is a cryptocurrency exchange where users can buy, sell, and manage crypto assets.

listOfURL.Title: Binance
listOfURL.Description: Binance is one of the world's largest crypto trading platforms with multiple exchange options.

listOfURL.Title: Ethereum
listOfURL.Description: Ethereum is a decentralized blockchain platform that supports smart contracts and dApps.

listOfURL.Title: Bitcoin.org
listOfURL.Description: Bitcoin.org provides educational resources and information about Bitcoin and its network.

listOfURL.Title: Amazon
listOfURL.Description: Amazon is a global online marketplace offering a wide range of products and services.

listOfURL.Title: eBay
listOfURL.Description: eBay is an online marketplace that allows users to buy and sell new or used items through auctions and direct sales.

listOfURL.Title: Shopify
listOfURL.Description: Shopify provides a platform for businesses to create their own online stores and manage sales.

listOfURL.Title: Alibaba
listOfURL.Description: Alibaba connects global buyers and suppliers for wholesale trade and manufacturing services.

listOfURL.Title: BBC News
listOfURL.Description: BBC provides global news coverage, investigative journalism, and live broadcasts.

listOfURL.Title: CNN
listOfURL.Description: CNN is an international news network covering politics, business, technology, and more.

listOfURL.Title: The New York Times
listOfURL.Description: The New York Times delivers in-depth journalism, opinion pieces, and investigative reports.

listOfURL.Title: Reuters
listOfURL.Description: Reuters provides real-time global news coverage, including business and financial updates.

listOfURL.Title: Khan Academy
listOfURL.Description: Khan Academy offers free online courses and educational resources for students of all levels.

listOfURL.Title: Coursera
listOfURL.Description: Coursera partners with universities to provide online courses and degree programs.

listOfURL.Title: Udemy
listOfURL.Description: Udemy is an online learning platform with courses on various topics, including technology and business.

listOfURL.Title: edX
listOfURL.Description: edX offers university-level online courses from institutions like Harvard and MIT.
